data.title: "The Hot Sauce"
data.meta_description: So, we've gone ahead and used the time to start up with a revved up "The Hot Sauce" Podcast where I get to interview some of the cool folks I have met in the food and nutrition world.  You can see...
data.text:
So, we've gone ahead and used the time to start up with a revved up "The Hot Sauce" Podcast where I get to interview some of the cool folks I have met in the food and nutrition world.

You can see the Full Playlist here - ​https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLKN8ovn9IbnATx67J9XHGlY2jxRT3qE_W​

Episode 1 - Angela Lemond (business owner/media)

Episode 2 - Kristin Gradney (weight management/media)

Episode 3 - Milton Stokes (media)

Episode 4 - Chris Taylor (academia)

Episode 5 - Christen Cupples Cooper (academia)

Episode 6 - Kevin Sauer (academia)

Episode 7 - Neva Cochran (media)

Episode 8 - David Wiss (business owner/media)

Episode 9 - Amy Kimberlain (Diabetes/media)

Episode 10 - Grace Derocha (wellness/media)

Episode 11 - Cicely Thomas (community)

Episode 12 - Amy Bragagnini (Oncology/Renal/Media)

Episode 13 - Denine Rogers (wellness/business owner)

Episode 14 - Hope Warshaw (business owner)

Episode 15 - Carol Berg Sloan (mother) and Kelly Sloan (daughter)

Episode 16 - Melissa Majumdar (weight management/media)

Episode 17 - Lauri Wright (mother) and Addie Wright (daughter)

Episode 18 - Nina Crowley (weight management)

Episode 19 - Linda Farr (business owner)

Episode 20 - Caroline Susie (wellness/media)

Episode 21 - Jay Croft (non-RD, journalist)

Episode 22 - Monique Richard (business owner/media)

Up-coming guests

RD Guests - Katie Dodd, Jennifer Okemah, Vandana Sheth

Non-RD Guests - Hernando Planells, Joe Cannon

You can also catch the podcast on various audio platforms

Amazon Music - music.amazon.com/podcasts/383b505f-8b9a-47bf-9176-1accfe77622c/the-hot-sauce

Apple Podcast - podcasts.apple.com/gh/podcast/the-hot-sauce/id1190227964

Audible - www.audible.com/pd/The-Hot-Sauce-Podcast/B0BZNBWBCD?qid=1681245881&sr=1-18&ref=a_search_c3_lProduct_1_18&pf_rd_p=83218cca-c308-412f-bfcf-90198b687a2f&pf_rd_r=DYXD61SV7JDED38ZAH02&pageLoadId=2qAvJKxGtfCHbpUL&creativeId=0d6f6720-f41c-457e-a42b-8c8dceb62f2c

Google - podcasts.google.com/feed/aHR0cHM6Ly9mZWVkcy5zb3VuZGNsb3VkLmNvbS91c2Vycy9zb3VuZGNsb3VkOnVzZXJzOjE1MjUyOTAyMy9zb3VuZHMucnNz?sa=X&ved=0CAMQ4aUDahcKEwiYyePK2KL-AhUAAAAAHQAAAAAQRA

Pandora - www.pandora.com/podcast/the-hot-sauce/PC:1001063209

SoundCloud - soundcloud.com/acpnutrition/sets/the-hot-sauce-nutrition-podcast

Spotify - https://open.spotify.com/show/22FhYTdfYEJRGdFXjfj8gi

​My first interview on "The Hot Sauce" with Leslie Bonci - To listen to the podcast, please go here - Soundcloud

For more information on Leslie, you can find her here at Active Eating Advice

You can see a nice video done by the Academy of Nutrition & Dietetics here - Fueling the Professional Athlete - Dietitians in Sports.

She has 4 books for sale on Amazon if you are interested - Sports Nutrition for Coaches, The Active Calorie Diet, and Guide to Better Digestion

Social Media to follow Leslie -

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/leslie.bonci?fref=ts​

Twitter - https://twitter.com/lesliebonci

LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/leslie-bonci-b768758
